title._content: Scene at a Bull Fight - Paso del Norte, Mexico - Maddening the bull.

description._content: Title: Scene at a Bull Fight - Paso del Norte, Mexico - Maddening the bull. Creator: Parker, Francis F. Date: ca. 1882-1895 Part Of: El Paso, Texas and Paso del Norte, Mexico Place: Ciudad Juarez, Chihuahua, Mexico Physical Description: 1 photographic print: albumen; 8.5 x 17 cm. on 9.5 x 17.5 cm. mount File: ag1992_0821_08_bull_opt.jpg Rights: Please cite Southern Methodist University, Central University Libraries, DeGolyer Library when using this image file. A high-quality version of this file may be obtained for a fee by contacting degolyer@smu.edu. For more information, see: digitalcollections.smu.edu/cdm/ref/collection/tex/id/1720 View Texas: Photographs, Manuscripts, and Imprints digitalcollections.smu.edu/all/cul/tex/

note._content: Bell tower of Old Guadalupe de los Mansos Church
note.author: 53461717@N08

note._content: "Eclipse", today is a jewlery store, located across the street in Edificio Yepo
note.author: 53461717@N08

note._content: Subalterno dando un pase de tanteo (evaluation) con su capote de brega (struggle cloak). Working the first third (tercio de varas) of the bull fight, to learn the temper, virtues or deffects of the bull In commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Jesuli-torrecera.jpg you can see a capote de brega
note.author: 53461717@N08

note._content: Picador (spear tucker) In eldesjarretedeacho.blogspot.mx/2012/09/la-buena-suerte-de... you can see how the "suerte de varas" (sticks sort) is done today.
note.author: 53461717@N08

note._content:
Se sabe que el toro justo entró en el ruedo por que solo porta la divisa.
La divisa se compone de unas cintas de color, que representan a la ganadería, y que por medio de un arponcillo se clavan en el morrillo. Divisa compuesta por 3 cintas, con el hierro de la ganadería bordado.
note.author: 53461717@N08

note._content: Note que en los años que se tomó esta foto el caballo del picador no llevaba peto de protección.
note.author: 53461717@N08
